channel.title: World of the Paperback
channel.description:
This series is dedicated to the discussion of literary topics and of the publication of significant paperbound books.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: William H. McNeill's "The Rise of the West"
item.description: This program features William H. McNeill discussing his book "The Rise of the West."
item.dc:creator: Albrecht, Robert C.
item.dc:subject: Authors
